message.body: Star Trek 2009 refers to "xenolinguistics" lol
hahahahahaha, we're watching too. steven goes, "did he just say alien phrenology?" no, bro. phonology.
Haha wait you're watching it too? Wow coincidence. But love the linguistics reference
yeah, i never would have noticed it when i saw it in theaters way back then.
Yeah it slipped by me too
are you still watching star trek?
Yes I am. And yourself?
yes! it's weird, i know i saw this in theaters, but i don't remember it at alllll
You don't remember it?
I remember it. Some of the dialogue I don't remember
yeah, i have like no idea what's going on/what's going to happen. do you like it just as much the second time around?
Probably like the third or fourth time around. It's still really good
did you like the new one?
Yes that's the one I'm watching
no, i mean the sequel, haha
Oh sorry. Yea it was also good. I like this Kirk
chris pine is pretty great. but i think i prefer zachary quinto, just in general.
I mean they are both very good. But I can see why you would say that
did you watch american horror story?
Nope I have not.
quinto has roles in both seasons, but he's especially good in the second one.
Alright if I find myself in need of a new show i will try out AHS
for sure! what are you watching now?
Nothing. I've been playing board games and sports and going to the gym.
Although I occasionally watch the Tour de France
But that just started this week
aw, fuck, i can't wait to go home to watch the tour.
It's been a great race so far!
i'm excited. me and dad totally bond over it, he's actually big into cycling.
That's awesome! Sports has always been a good bonding thing with my father although my parents seemed to enjoy playing Settlers with me tonight
did you win?!
My mom trashed me. Beginners luck is so real
maybe that's what you had going...
Haha I've played a lot more times now. So I feel as though I've ran out of board game luck. At least I have real life luck
ughhh, real life luck is so unfair.
because i have none.
Ummmm yeah no. It's like I'm alive luck. Not like winning the lotto luck.
i have none of either type. but it's something you have in common with shan.
That and a love for settlers
